trends: There has been one other sighting in Baxter
There were no other sightings in Baxter on or around May 20th 2011
Summary: bright light in the sky . east of were i was standing . and close .
divs: sighting detailstonight at 9:43pm cst .5\20\2011 i was outside talking to my neighbor .and just looked up in the eastern sky and seen a bright light in the sky it seamed to turn slowly and then vanish . the sighting lasted maybe 30 seconds . i didnt say anything to my neighbor untill it was over . as i thought at first it was a plane coming out of the clouds with its landing lights on . then i seen there was no clouds and the stars were out in a clear sky. there was only 1 light . not 2 like landing lights . and there was no strobe or flashing lights like an airplane . also there was no sound of any kind . it did not look like a shooting star , as it was white in color. it seamed to turn as the light got dimmer then was gone . thought it was a plane and went back in to the clouds . dont know if it's a ufo or not . but it is strange , so i figured i'd report it. *(wit's name deleted--cms\sg).
